test:
import torch
from starter_code import log_softmax_stable, cross_entropy_loss

y_true = torch.tensor([0,1])
y_pred = torch.tensor([[2.0,1.0,0.1],[0.5,2.5,0.3]])

# Test log-softmax
expected_log_softmax = torch.tensor([[-0.5514,-1.5514,-2.4514],[-2.2808,-0.2808,-2.4808]])
assert torch.allclose(log_softmax_stable(y_pred), expected_log_softmax, atol=1e-3)

# Test cross-entropy loss
expected_loss = 0.4161
assert abs(cross_entropy_loss(y_true, y_pred).item() - expected_loss) < 1e-3
